description:
Over 6360 students have already enrolled!

Updated On: Feb 9, 2015

This is a course which includes 12 baby step by baby step lessons in which you will learn exactly how to make more money from the websites that you sell on auction while giving the most amazing customer support.

The class is most suited for total beginners who are new to make more money from the websites they sell.

Your class project will be to increase the money that you earn from a website buyer.

Because I am fully aware that one of the biggest problems that beginners encounter when they try to make money online is "Information Overload" I have kept each video only a few minutes long, so you will not be overwhelmed by information.

In this training you will discover exactly how to:

1. The Proper Way To Contact A Buyer After The Sale

2. How To Transfer The Domain To Your Buyer

3. How To Open, Set , And Submit A Clickbank account for Your Buyer

4. How To Set A Mailing List For Your Buyer.

5. How To Edit Your HTML Files For Maximum Profit.
title: Start Running an Online Business by Auctioning Websites
